title: Search for Kap Antiqua
content:
My father Karl Pausch, who died in 1984, created a typface called Kap Antiqua for VCG in the seventies. I remember the time when worked on it and he left me a copy of some of his originals.  
Does someone know something about this typeface: Examples where it was used? Is it still in use? Are there still documents or originals about this typface at VGC?

Many thanks in advance for every hint!

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*  
Dr. Rolf Pausch  
Medienwissenschaftler

E-Mail:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150202001035im_/http:/typophile.com/files/KP-Archiv15_5072.jpg)
author: DocP
